feed.title: Category: programming | Andhi Noerdianto Personal Website

entry.title: function helper: get column excel with PHP
entry.content:
```php <?php / * @param integer $col * return string / function get_column($col) {

$columns = array(
        1=>'A',2=>'B',3=>'C',4=>'D',5=>'E',6=>'F',7=>'G',8=>'H',
        9=>'I',10=>'J',11=>'K',12=>'L',13=>'M',14=>'N',15=>'O',16=>'P',
        17=>'Q',18=>'R',19=>'S',20=>'T',21=>'U',22=>'V',23=>'W',24=>'X',
        25=>'Y',26=>'Z'
);

$a = floor($col/26);
$b = $col%26;
if(($a < 1) or ($a == 1 and $b == 0)) return $columns[$col];
if($b == 0) return $columns[$a-1] . 'Z';
$c = $columns[$a] . $columns[$b];

return $c;

}

example

echo get_column(30); ?> ```

Regards
{cahkaibon}

entry.title: variable on the fly in PHP
entry.content:
creating variable on the fly with PHP: php <?php $str = 'testing'; $$str = 'on the fly'; echo $testing; ?>

Regards
{cahkaibon}
